data.feedback: All 9 user requirements are fully covered. All filesToRead reference verified existing backend files. Flutter repo is correctly empty for new project creation. API alignment is perfect - all endpoints, models, and WebSocket events match. Clean architecture with proper separation of concerns.
issues: Minor: Duplicate dependencies in some epic arrays
Minor: ExecutionOrder values should be more distinct
Note: Backend has no /logout endpoint but client-side logout is valid
suggestions: Fix duplicate dependencies in epic-ui-foundation, epic-auth-ui, etc.
Update executionOrder to be sequential: 1, 2, 3, 4 instead of multiple 2s
Consider adding a profile/settings feature for user preferences
